scenes.title: Ashwood Manor - Foyer
scenes.text: A brass key sits in a dusted dish. Footsteps echo beyond the stair.

scenes.title: Great Hall
scenes.text: Portraits watch with patient disapproval. A door to the gallery is unlatched.

scenes.title: Long Gallery
scenes.text: Moonlight stripes the carpet. One portrait is freshly polished, its plaque pried loose.

scenes.title: Study
scenes.text: A ledger lies open, an entry circled in red. The lamp flickers.

scenes.title: Ledger Note
scenes.text: The entry mentions a sealed contract signed at midnight. A margin note: 'The beginning of Ashwood & Co.'

scenes.title: Prologue Ends
scenes.text: You feel the house acknowledge you. The mystery begins.
